name: Airclip
body:
### Description

#### ☛ Web clipper
> - Clip the whole webpage

#### ✦ Pure android
> - Material Design
> - Translucent status bar and navigation bar

#### ✦ Tiny
> - Less than 1MB
> - ✦ Clean
> - does not consume much memory
> - never run in background

#### ⬆︎Android 4.0 +

### Authors and Contributors

> - [twitter.com/hyongbai](https://twitter.com/hyongbai)
> - [weibo.com/hyongbai](https://weibo.com/hyongbai)
> - [hyongbai@gmail.com](mailto://hyongbai@gmail.com)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
